This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS background-color property, color value 
PASS property value, accordionColor, foo 
PASS border-width property, border-style = none 
PASS border-width property, border-style = solid, floating point pixel value 
PASS font-size property, em value 
PASS width property, percentage value 
PASS custom property, forced style recalc 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
